post.text: The next time Trump throws a tantrum, picture him in the Situation Room making life-or-death decisions for us.

comment.author: Eric
comment.text: Donald Trump - Trump is known as PAYASO (clown) in Mexico, BUFFOON in England, and here in the US - The ORANGE DOOFAS! The ORANGE BUFFOON! Treasonous, dishonest, disgusting Donald.
